Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor, please click to donate so that we can get in touch with you soon. We thank you for your kindness in advance!

name: Washing Machine
description: Client is a terminally ill patient with dementia and cancer. He requires a washing machine for his hygiene needs urgently. Family has financial difficulties and are unable to afford a washing machine for him. Family will need support with transport of the washing machine (preferably with installation if possible, otherwise, transport and a washing machine in good condition is also okay). Kindly contact Amanda social worker at my work mobile number at 84282545.

name: Washing Machine
description:
Client is a single mother with 4 school-going children. Family is living in a HDB rental.

Client's washing machine broke down recently and client hopes to replace it quickly, as she needs to complete laundry to ensure her children have clean uniform to wear to school daily.  Please WhatsApp Mei at 8484 3156 or email to meilinda.tan@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

name: Fridge
description: Client is a single-father, of two primary-school children. Client faces financial difficulty as he is the sole bread winner. The family recently secured a public rental flat and requires a new fridge as the current fridge has malfunctioned. Client relies on cooking frequently, to reduce food expenses. Hence, he hopes to secure a fridge soon, to reduce expenses on purchased cooked food. Please WhatsApp Mei at 8484 3156 or email to meilinda.tan@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

passiton.name: Tecno Mini Fridge
passiton.description:
I received this mini fridge as a donation when my home burnt down and now want to pass it on to the next person. It's still very cold and with a bit of cleaning can be very functional.

I won't be able to do the delivery, so please make your own arrangements if possible. Thank you.

name: Washing Machine
description:
*** UREGNTLY REQUIRED!! ***
Sunbeam Place @ Children's Society requires a washing machine urgently for the home. The current one is spoilt and they required it urgently.
Any brand and preferably larger in size for big loads.
Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor, please click to donate so that we can get in touch with you soon. We thank you for your kindness in advance!

name: Fridge
description: Family of 5 recently moved into their rental unit at Clementi. Aging father is sole breadwinner for the family and mum (with health concerns) is caregiver to son with special needs. Their two older daughters are schooling. Family is slowly re-purchasing needed household items, but is currently unable to afford replacing their current fridge, which is starting to spoil (works on/off).

contact.org: SHINE Children and Youth Services - Hougang
contact.name: Ang Hua Jun

passiton.name: Tecno Mini Fridge
passiton.description:
I received this mini fridge as a donation when my home burnt down and now want to pass it on to the next person. It's still very cold and with a bit of cleaning can be very functional.

I won't be able to do the delivery, so please make your own arrangements if possible. Thank you.

name: Washing Machine
description:
Family is a single mother household, struggling to work alongside the caregiving commitments of her 30 month old toddler. She has been finding it difficult to make ends meet, as her young child has poor immunity and falls sick often, and has to fend for medical costs for her child's needs.
She is in need of a washing machine as her current one is faulty, and has only been able to hand wash her child's school uniforms.

name: Refrigerator
description: This a family of 7 (of 5 school-going children) living in a 2-room HDB rental unit. Due to low income and large family, PCI is low and the family struggle with large expenses. Recently, their fridge had gone faulty and they are hoping to receive a donation for a second-hand fridge (preferably Halal).

name: Washing machine
description: Family is a young couple with 3 children - 2 children below 2 years old. They require a washing machine as they do not own one yet and have little time to go to a laundromat often due to caregiving.

name: Washing Machine
description: Low income and single mother family of 2 (mother and teenage daughter) currently needs a new washing machine as its spoilt and they do not have money to get a new one or a second hand one as they are fully dependent on financial assistance as mother is unable to work due to her physical health issues and is on long term MC. She has limited mobility as well and requires a walking frame to walk. As the washing machine is spoilt, mother is unable to wash clothes properly (unable to bend her back to wash and daughter is usually only back home at night and unable to wash much). They hope to receive some support for a preloved but good working condition washing machine (with installation support) so that they can get back to their normal routines at home. Please feel free to reach out to me for more information if needed through email. Thank you for supporting the family!

name: Washing Machine
description: Family with two young boys (2+, 1+) has moved out from their parents' home into their rental flat early this year. Current washer malfunctioned (i.e. water keeps flowing into the tub throughout a wash cycle).

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Jalan Besar
contact.name: Andrew Hong

name: Washing Machine
description:
Client (44/M) moved into a 1-room rental flat in Woodlands. He is a stroke recovered patient and has mental health conditions, leading to his inability to sustain employment. He has little family support. His current flat is completely unfurnished and require essential items:
*Washing Machine 
*Fridge 
*Bed, pillow and bedding set
*Wardrobe 
*Fan
*Television 
*Shelves

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Huang Wei Jie

name: Mini Fridge
description:
Client who is unemployed and disabled requires a mini fridge to store his food. He stays alone in a rental flat with no next of kin. 
Please contact Tracy@97244034 if you wish to donate. Thank you for your kindness.

* Delivery to be arranged by donor.

description: We are a children's home serving children with trauma needs. We are looking to revamp the children's play, lounge. This is for the long-term usage at the home. Thank you

name: Washing Machine
description: Family of 6 with children ages 5-12 years old requires a washing machine as their is spoil, upon checking it is costly for family to repair it and they are currently having financial constraints. Your assistance will be greatly appreciated.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Kelly Gan

name: Washing Machine
description: Three elderly who aged above 75 years old are living in the same household. They have no children and they rely on each other for household chores. They are in need for a washing machine in view of their challenges to manage laundry. For second hand washing machine, they prefer is from Muslim family.

name: Washing Machine
description: Family has 4 school-going children, and mother is currently 7 months pregnant. Family does not have a washing machine at home due to financial difficulties faced at home. Mother is not able to work due to pregnancy and caregiving for her children at home. Mother will usually hand wash clothes, but has difficulty doing so now in view of her heavy pregnancy.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Marine Parade Family Service Centre
contact.name: Natasha Cho

name: Washing Machine
description: Family is made up of husband wife and 8 school-going children. They are all living together in a 2-room flat. Father is working odd jobs to make ends meet. They require a washing machine as their current one is faulty and they cannot afford a new one.

name: Washing Machine
description: Person is a single mother to 5 children. Family is struggling financially and is dependent on financial assistance. Client has been in search of employment however her attempts have been unsuccessful thus far. As their current washing machine is not in a working condition, family hopes to receive a top load (8 to 10kg) washing machine for their usage. For further liaison, kindly contact me at 98598768, thank you!

name: Washing Machine
description: The client is a single mother to a primary-school going child who is living with mental health challenges. She is a full-time caregiver for her child as her son needs round-the-clock supervision and support. Hence, the family is undergoing significant hardship without a breadwinner in the household. The family's washing machine had recently turned faulty and they are in need of a replacement. Please kindly contact Bryan at 6365 8751 to liaise for matters regarding this request. Thank you.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Lei Hui Yun

name: Washing Machine
description: Elderly brothers in their late 60s who was previously homeless recently got their rental flat from HDB. They experience financial difficulties and is unable to afford home appliances.

name: Washing machine
description: A family of 3 with a 2 years old require a working condition washing machine, at least 8kg

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Chua Pei Ching

name: Washing machine
description: Single elderly man staying in rental unit, unable to work due to medical condition affecting his cognitive functioning. The current washing machine is spoilt but he does not have savings to replace it.

name: Washing Machine
description:
Client (M, 49) lives in a 2R rental flat with his wife and currently only is able to wash his clothes at laundromats in the neighbourhood. He hopes for a washing machine so that he can wash his clothes at home and save money on laundry.

He has financial and employment issues as he cannot walk properly due to a stroke a decade ago. Therefore, he hopes for support to fund a washing machine for him and his wife. Thank you.

name: washing machine
description: Client has 2 young school-going children and they are staying in a rental flat. Due to caregiving issues, she is still trying to find employment. Their washing machine has spoilt and due to financial circumstances, client is unable to afford a washing machine. Kindly whatsapp Liyana  at 83226427 should you wish to donate, thank you!

name: Refrigerator
description: Low income single mother with 3 children under 18, staying in a rental flat lack money to buy a new fridge as the one at their place is on the verge of spoiling and unable to keep meat fresh (they often cook at home to save money). As mother is not working (unfit for work MC) and family is reliant on financial assistance to get by, the family does not have enough money to buy a new or second hand fridge and would benefit if a donor can donate a preloved good working condition one (but do note that family is a Muslim family). It would be very helpful if a donor could support the family with this. Thank you!

name: Washing Machine
description:
the client is an isolated elderly with health issues which has rendered her unfit for work. 
There is no family member who is available to care for her and she is dependent on the formal support of the social services. 
Recently, her washing machine of many years has broken down and she is in need of a new washing machine at the moment.

name: Washing machine
description:
Client is the sole breadwinner of a family of 5, with 3 children. 
One of his children is with special needs and his wife has to stay home to take care of him full time. The other 2 children are studying full-time, unable to help with the family finances. 
Recently, client's washing machine and fridge spoiled and he is unable to afford to purchase new ones. 
It has been difficult for the family, especially during this Hari Raya season when they are supposed to go visiting. Would be helpful for this family if anyone could donate a washing machine or fridge to them.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

name: Washing machine
description: Single mother recently managed to upgrade to a 2-room flexi flat after staying in rental flat for the past decade. Client spent most of her savings to get the necessities for her new place, and currently lacks a washing machine. Client has physical and mental health condition that makes it difficult for her to wash clothes manually, so she hopes to be able to have a washing machine to ease doing laundry for her and her child.

name: Washing Machine
description: Family of 5 with 3 school-going children: F/9, M/7, F/5. Wife is sole breadwinner working part-time, and husband certified unable to work. Washing machine recently went faulty, and as such family had to go to the laundromat to wash their clothes ever since. A washing machine will greatly benefit the family especially since Raya festivities is around the corner.

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Kreta Ayer
contact.name: Mohamad Harith

name: Washing Machine
description:
Client's household has 12 people and their washing machine broke down. Huge laundry load daily, strain on client's finances to maintain routines.

If you have a suitable washing machine for donation please contact me at 92960569 or email me at muhammadsuffian@mws.sg
